channel.title: Somone plz help, ill be ur best buddy :)
channel.description:
This is a noob question, but in my server, theres no wilderness except for the pking box. When you die there, you keep all your items.
Can somone plz tell me how to make a wilderness area and lose your items if you die?
[b]You could get MOD if you help me![/b]

item.title: Somone plz help, ill be ur best buddy :)
item.dc:creator: @artash artash
item.description:
@artash wrote:

uhhh… what? im noobish…

Read full topic
